definition: Du Fu (712-770), great Tang dynasty poet
Du Fu's Thatched Cottage (park and museum in Chengdu)

sentences.english: Du fu, ancient Chinese poetry history one of the greatest poets.
sentences.chinese: 杜甫，中国古代诗歌史上最巨大的诗人之一。

sentences.english: The double images of the eagle deeply reflect the internal contradiction of Du Fu's character.
sentences.chinese: 雕意象的二重性深刻地体现了杜甫人格的内在矛盾。

sentences.english: Chapter Three analyzes Tu Fu's influence on Rexroth's creation.
sentences.chinese: 第三章主要论述杜甫对雷克斯罗思诗歌创作的影响。

sentences.english: Lishangyin's seven-syllable formed another peak after Dufu.
sentences.chinese: 李商隐的七律形成了杜甫之后的又一座高峰。

sentences.english: Du Fu was a great poet with "military ideas".
sentences.chinese: 杜甫在唐代是一位很有“军事意识”的伟大诗人。

sentences.english: Life suffering constantly du fuis final, how to leave the world?
sentences.chinese: 终身灾难不时的杜甫最终是怎样分开人世的呢？

sentences.english: Dufu paid much attention to the form of space and time of "night" in his poems.
sentences.chinese: 杜甫在诗中深刻关注“夜”这一时空形式。

sentences.english: Through different stages of creation, there were inner contacts between poet's vision and horse images.
sentences.chinese: 杜甫创作的各个阶段诗人心象与马意象存在内在联系。

sentences.english: Du Fu's poetry had an overall influence on Yuan Haowen's style.
sentences.chinese: 杜甫诗歌对遗山词风的影响是全面的。

sentences.english: During his life time the Tang Dynasty was in decay .
sentences.chinese: 杜甫生活得年代，唐朝已经由兴盛走向衰败。

sentences.english: The author of this poem is the famous Tang Dynasty poet Du Fu.
sentences.chinese: 这首诗的作者，是唐代著名诗人杜甫。

sentences.english: Would you please introduce one of the drinking poems written by Du Fu?
sentences.chinese: 你能告诉我几句杜甫写的饮酒诗吗？

sentences.english: The period of Shangyuan is a rest stop for Du Fu in his late years of vagrant life.
sentences.chinese: 上元年间，是杜甫晚年漂泊生涯中的一个歇脚期。

sentences.english: Among the poets in the Six Dynasties, Bao Zhao's influence on Du Fu was only second to Yu Xin's.
sentences.chinese: 在六朝诗人中，鲍照对杜甫的影响仅次于庚信。

sentences.english: There are more than one hundred poems about eating in Du Fu's poetry.
sentences.chinese: 杜甫诗中直接和间接涉及到吃饭的诗大约有一百多首。

definition: "sage of poetry", epithet of Du Fu 杜甫[Du4 Fu3]
Meng Jiao (751-814), Tang dynasty essayist and poet
Lu Zhaolin (637-689), one of the Four Great Poets of the Early Tang 初唐四傑|初唐四杰[Chu1 Tang2 Si4 jie2]

Su Shi (1037-1101), also known as Su Dongpo 蘇東坡|苏东坡[Su1 Dong1 po1] northern Song Dynasty writer and calligrapher/one of the Three Su father and sons 三蘇|三苏[San1 Su1] and one of the Eight Giants of Tang and Song Prose 唐宋八大家[Tang2 Song4 Ba1 Da4 jia1]
Han Yu (768-824), Tang dynasty essayist and poet, advocate of the classical writing 古文運動|古文运动 and neoclassical 復古|复古 movements
Li Bai (701-762), famous Tang Dynasty poet
